pages.text: The last I remember is I was home with my family. My dog, Blizzard, jumped onto my lap, then I must have blinked because I found myself in an inhospitable land full of dark foul creatures. The land was indefinable, unlike anything I imagined possible. All I can say was I found myself in a never-ending land of caverns, floating islands, shelves, and plateaus.

To prevent insanity, I have documented my successes and failures. Maybe, this journal will help you get through this living nightmare.$(p)Thankfully, some valuable gifts were given by some unknown entity. The first thing I did was put on my armor and grabbed my sword and shield.
